creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
description: state patrolman with wrinkled neck and hands, wearing a helmet; other figures in background
marks: \"#10\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK B \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
title: Oxford, Mississippi.  Waiting for James Meredith, the first African American to register at the University of Mississippi.
